akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2086. Definition As used in this part, the term “Member of the House of Representatives” means a Representative in, or a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to, the Congress. (Pub. L. 100–696, title VIII, § 806, Nov. 18, 1988, 102 Stat. 4610.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was classified to section 188a–5 of former Title 40, prior to the enactment of Title 40, Public Buildings, Property, and Works, by Pub. L. 107–217, § 1, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1062.
